hints.content: Which of the shapes also has $4$ equal sides and $4$ angles?

This shape belongs in the group:

[[☃ image 1]]

options.alt: A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 9 meters. The corners of the shape are right angles. !

question.content:
The following shapes all belong to the same group.

 | | 
- | - | -
![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 6 centimeters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/0e1ea23be0abed8a06874d1c6659fa790eebd8ad) | ![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 8 meters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/7f0e5540e40971727b10085f0bbaa16df59afac5) | ![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 4 centimeters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/2a41c1216b3e3ecad9391767b9bba2d970e3b2b5)

All of the shapes have $4$ equal sides and $4$ right angles.

**Which of the following shapes belongs in the group?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A four-sided shape. The longer sides are labeled 15 meters each. The shorter sides are labeled 8 meters each. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/be7afa2e3eed8e500d02da29a91b1cf254fa63fa)
![A four-sided shape. Each side is labeled 9 meters. The corners of the shape are right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/84a4a8c943bb4aaed33110409562c01503086a1c)

![A four-sided shape. The top side is labeled 10 centimeters, the bottom side is labeled 7 centimeters, the left side is labeled 8 centimeters, and the right side is labeled 8 centimeters. The corners of the shape are not right angles.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/1430e415a50ff59338a5a48e4614bc2f63c246b4)
![A five-sided shape. Each side is labeled 7 meters.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/f89bb73ce638aa17bf5d0e7125f226eb377f3f6c)
